install_msg:
Thank you for installing the timeseries cog.
**Warning: By loading that cog, a background task will be launched, that background task may be a bit usage intensive.**
This cog will provide you multiple stats about your bot directly in bot object with `bot.stats`, but its main purpose is to send this data to an InfluxDB bucket. It will only works with InfluxDB v2 instances. Make sure to have an instance running, all commands to connect to your instance are in `[p]timeseriesset` group command.
For now you are on your own when installing this cog, I don't provide any guide to setup InfluxDB, but it will come later, which is why it is on that branch. In the meantime here is official docs: https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/get-started/.
name: TimeSeries
short: Sends multiple stats of your bot to an InfluxDB bucket.
description: Sends multiple stats of your bot to an InfluxDB bucket.
